subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wright-Phillips and Lloyd Sam scored in the Red Bulls’ home opener, but a group of fans chanted support for Mike Petke, who was fired as the team’s coach in the off-season.
snippet: Bradley Wright-Phillips and Lloyd Sam scored in the Red Bulls’ home opener, but a group of fans chanted support for Mike Petke, who was fired as the team’s coach in the off-season.
